description: Returns information about the specified human loop. If the human loop was deleted, this operation will return a ResourceNotFoundException error.

parameters.name: HumanLoopName
parameters.description: The name of the human loop that you want information about.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The creation time when Amazon Augmented AI created the human loop.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The reason why a human loop failed. The failure reason is returned when the status of the human loop is Failed.

nested_items.name: FailureCode
nested_items.description: A failure code that identifies the type of failure.

nested_items.name: HumanLoopStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the human loop.

nested_items.name: HumanLoopName
nested_items.description: The name of the human loop. The name must be lowercase, unique within the Region in your account, and can have up to 63 characters. Valid characters: a-z, 0-9, and - (hyphen).

nested_items.name: HumanLoopArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the human loop.

nested_items.name: FlowDefinitionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the flow definition.

nested_items.name: HumanLoopOutput
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about the output of the human loop.

nested_items.name: OutputS3Uri
nested_items.description: The location of the Amazon S3 object where Amazon Augmented AI stores your human loop output.
